author: avp2306
created_time: July 12, 2023, 07:40:44 AMLast edit: July 17, 2023, 09:25:07 AM by avp2306
content: Top 5 Bitcoin documentaries that is good to watch since we can learn a lot of things from this documentaries and for sure it can help a lot for newbies and to those who are curious to know more additional information about this.Watch and enjoy this videosðŸ˜€ if you want more videos like this you can grab more on youtube.Bitcoin: Beyond the Bubble Cryptopia Where did bitcoin came from? Â Magic Money The bitcoin gospelNewly addedThe trust machine Banking on Bitcoin Bitcoin in Africa Â Quote from: dzungmobile on July 12, 2023, 10:59:32 AMSome lists and some more movies, documentaries[Collection Thread] Series and films in which Bitcoin (or Altcoins) appearThe most worth watching Bitcoin moviesBlockchain Books, Bitcoin Movies And DocumentariesQuote from: Wind_FURY on July 12, 2023, 03:29:46 PMAnother good documentary about Bitcoin is "Deep Web: The Rise And Fall of The Silk Road" by Alex Winter, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7GAoeo4FnBUSome good blogs for newbies to start reading are,- https://medium.com/@beautyon_- https://murchandamus.medium.com/- https://notgrubles.medium.com/Quote from: arwin100 on July 13, 2023, 08:59:43 AMLemme add this.Bitcoin bigbang - https://youtu.be/2tbKisfkLFoThe great reset and rise of bitcoin - https://youtu.be/MOm_QmnRBSsLargest bitcoin mines on earth - https://youtu.be/pWnN3WQ2m5MQuote from: sokani on July 13, 2023, 10:09:49 AMNice one op, you have a great list up there but I would also like to share these ones, they are really nice and you can probably add it to your compilations: 1. Banking on Bitcoin.2. The Rise and Rise of Bitcoin.3. Bitcoin: The End of Money as We Know It.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: Some lists and some more movies, documentaries[Collection Thread] Series and films in which Bitcoin (or Altcoins) appearThe most worth watching Bitcoin moviesBlockchain Books, Bitcoin Movies And DocumentariesCryptopia: Bitcoin, blockchains and the future of the internet movie

comments.author: avp2306
comments.body: Quote from: dzungmobile on July 12, 2023, 10:59:32 AMSome lists and some more movies, documentaries[Collection Thread] Series and films in which Bitcoin (or Altcoins) appearThe most worth watching Bitcoin moviesBlockchain Books, Bitcoin Movies And DocumentariesCryptopia: Bitcoin, blockchains and the future of the internet movieThank you for sharing since this can really help especially to those people who love to watch documentaries or anything related to bitcoin. But I remove the cryptopia since I already added it on OP.To many nice movies like thus available on internet and its good to replace netflix to this (documentaries/movies) for a while since we can learn more with this videos.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: avp2306 on July 12, 2023, 07:40:44 AMTop 5 Bitcoin documentaries that is good to watch since we can learn a lot of things from this documentaries and for sure it can help a lot for newbies and to those who are curious to know more additional information about this.Watch and enjoy this videosðŸ˜€ if you want more videos like this you can grab more on youtube.Bitcoin: Beyond the Bubble Cryptopia Where did bitcoin came from? Â Magic Money The bitcoin gospelÂ Quote from: dzungmobile on July 12, 2023, 10:59:32 AMSome lists and some more movies, documentaries[Collection Thread] Series and films in which Bitcoin (or Altcoins) appearThe most worth watching Bitcoin moviesBlockchain Books, Bitcoin Movies And DocumentariesI really appreciate these bitcoin documentaries that both of you guys to help people gain more knowledge on bitcoin through entertainment. With documentaries learning bitcoin will be very easy for both adults and teens. You have made me to have a new strategy on how to give bitcoin awareness to people in my locality that are curious to know about bitcoin. I will use this videos to teach it so that they can understand better than all my bla bla. I will create out time and to watch them first to decide if they are good tools to teach a newbie on bitcoin

comments.author: Wind_FURY
comments.body: Another good documentary about Bitcoin is "Deep Web: The Rise And Fall of The Silk Road" by Alex Winter, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7GAoeo4FnBUIt's not entirely a "Bitcoin documentary", but the story of the Silk Road will always be a part of Bitcoin's history. It's also one of the first places of commerce that started Bitcoin's economic loop, which made it stop being a natural occuring Ponzi.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Thanks for sharing some of these documentaries I will watch in my spare time and want to know the full extent of the documentary.This is quite important for me and want to know the history of bitcoin again in the documentary made in the video, I think this will also help some beginners especially in knowing the history of bitcoin.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: Quote from: avp2306 on July 12, 2023, 07:40:44 AMTop 5 Bitcoin documentaries that is good to watch since we can learn a lot of things from this documentaries and for sure it can help a lot for newbies and to those who are curious to know more additional information about this.Watch and enjoy this videosðŸ˜€ if you want more videos like this you can grab more on youtube.Bitcoin: Beyond the Bubble Cryptopia Where did bitcoin came from? Â Magic Money The bitcoin gospelÂ Quote from: dzungmobile on July 12, 2023, 10:59:32 AMSome lists and some more movies, documentaries[Collection Thread] Series and films in which Bitcoin (or Altcoins) appearThe most worth watching Bitcoin moviesBlockchain Books, Bitcoin Movies And DocumentariesQuote from: Makus on July 12, 2023, 03:15:50 PMMore documentaries to watch1 Bitcoin:Digitals Gold? 2 Bitcoin: The End of Money 3The Bitcoin DilemmaQuote from: Wind_FURY on July 12, 2023, 03:29:46 PMAnother good documentary about Bitcoin is "Deep Web: The Rise And Fall of The Silk Road" by Alex Winter, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7GAoeo4FnBUIt will no longer be educating newcomers about bitcoin and its awareness without supporting it with documentary movies so that they can gain a thorough understanding of what they need to know more about. I now have a collection of documentaries that I can share with others and store for individuals who might be interested in learning more about bitcoin in the future. thank you all forÂ sharing these documentaries, folks. I don't know how to express my gratitude to you all

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: avp2306 on July 12, 2023, 07:40:44 AMCryptopiaCrytopia, it was a pretty interesting documentary that I watched sometime back when it aired in Al-Jazeera. Seeing it on such a channel actually excited me, knowing that it was going to be watched by the masses. Though on Al-Jazeera it's about 47 mins which means some info might have been trimmed off.The Others I think I haven't watched. I might get some time to watch them as well.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Thanks for this list. I will make time to watch these documentaries. I have always put off watching Bitcoin-related documentaries. I used to search for the likes of these on Netflix and it seemed there wasn't much. I'm glad that you bring up this topic once more. I'm amazed even the story of Cryptopia has its own documentary. I might prioritize this one because I was a user and I still have funds stuck in there. It's just now that I realize I've never really known the reasons behind its collapse.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: The worst part about these series usually are the fact that they are old news, you end up seeing stuff that are from the past and you are will know the future and what happens after the movie ends. I mean you can't shoot a movie in a month and release it, usually that's a youtube video and you can do daily youtube videos if you want but then it's not going to be a docuseries, plus after it ends, time will pass until people see it, you are not going to get everyone watching it on release day neither, some of these videos are years old.It means that these grow old very quickly, bitcoin world is not same from one month to next one, how could we see years old documentaries and think that these are going to be relevant one way or another.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: el kaka22 on July 13, 2023, 03:06:23 AMThe worst part about these series usually are the fact that they are old news, you end up seeing stuff that are from the past and you are will know the future and what happens after the movie ends. I mean you can't shoot a movie in a month and release it, usually that's a youtube video and you can do daily youtube videos if you want but then it's not going to be a docuseries, plus after it ends, time will pass until people see it, you are not going to get everyone watching it on release day neither, some of these videos are years old.It means that these grow old very quickly, bitcoin world is not same from one month to next one, how could we see years old documentaries and think that these are going to be relevant one way or another.Agreed with your point of view but without knowing the history you cannot analyse the present situation. Last year Netflix had release a documentary: Trust No One: The Hunt for the Crypto King. It was on Gerald Cotten the founder ofÂ  QuadrigaCX cryptocurrency exchange. Many here might not have heard about this guy and how this exchange was the reason a lot of investors lost thier funds. This incidentÂ  gave a major boost to Not your Keys, Not your Coins slogan.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Merit.s on July 12, 2023, 02:23:13 PMI really appreciate these Bitcoin documentaries that both of you guys to help people gain more knowledge on Bitcoin through entertainment. With documentaries learning Bitcoin will be very easy for both adults and teens. You have made me to have a new strategy on how to give Bitcoin awareness to people in my locality that are curious to know about Bitcoin. I will use these videos to teach it so that they can understand better than all my bla bla. I will create out time and to watch them first to decide if they are good tools to teach a newbie about bitcoinI agree with you on that because Bitcoin teaching has been one of the hard parts in educating people and creating awareness about Bitcoin but with all these movies and documentaries it will make the teaching process easy and smooth for both to the learner and the one teaching, but then also we must put into account the important of us attempting to first go through all the documentaries and video so that we can actually understand all it content because if you must know in teaching other about new technology you first need to have a well-defined understanding of the contents and the subjects therein so that you can easily pass on the right information since not all the aspects need to be thought some part can easily be left for the learner to discover by him/her self.I for one i will benefit from all the list posted because recently a young girl of 19 years ask me to pass on some Bitcoin knowledge to her and since then I have been looking for ways to do that stress-free and I am sure this documentary is goi g to allow me the chance to easily point out the key vital points to her.

comments.author: Wind_FURY
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on July 12, 2023, 09:47:25 PMQuote from: Wind_FURY on July 12, 2023, 03:29:46 PMAnother good documentary about Bitcoin is "Deep Web: The Rise And Fall of The Silk Road" by Alex Winter, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7GAoeo4FnBUIt will no longer be educating newcomers about bitcoin and its awareness without supporting it with documentary movies so that they can gain a thorough understanding of what they need to know more about. I now have a collection of documentaries that I can share with others and store for individuals who might be interested in learning more about bitcoin in the future. thank you all forÂ sharing these documentaries, folks. I don't know how to express my gratitude to you all Documentaries are good, but the community shouldn't stop guiding newbies by providing them the right information, and having them listen to the right people. Anti-Bitcoin trolls, and their sock puppets, are always playing 4D Chess, pretending to be "good" when in fact they spread misinformation. Some good blogs for newbies to start reading are,- https://medium.com/@beautyon_- https://murchandamus.medium.com/- https://notgrubles.medium.com/

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Lemme add this.Bitcoin bigbang - https://youtu.be/2tbKisfkLFoThe great reset and rise of bitcoin - https://youtu.be/MOm_QmnRBSsLargest bitcoin mines on earth - https://youtu.be/pWnN3WQ2m5MGreat videos to be added on the list, for sure a lot of people can enjoy all of that videos especially for those people who get a hard time to learn more about bitcoin and this documentary videos can explain about some important information about bitcoin.

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: since i just see this topic i would like to point to my thread (Great 6-part Bitcoin documentary from 2021ðŸ“ºðŸ“½) where the very interesting and popular documentary series 'The Mystery of Satoshi' can be presented and watched.
